text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Svativskyi Raion | native_name = Сватівський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Flag of Svativskiy raion.png | flag_alt = Flag of Svativskyi Raion | image_shield = Coat of Arms of Svativskiy raion.png | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Svativskyi Raion | image_map = Svatovo Rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = 250px | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1923 | seat_type = Admin. center | seat = Svatove | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 1740 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 76693 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = | website = http://svt.loga.gov.ua | footnotes = }}Svatove Raion is one of the eight raions (districts) of Luhansk oblast in eastern Ukraine. The administrative center of the district is the city of Svatove. Svatove Raion is occupied by Russian soldiers (as of 2023). ==Related page== *Warfare in eastern Ukraine during the Russo-Ukrainian War ==References== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Luhansk Oblast
title: Svatove Raion
